ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Dredd's quest for the Judge Child takes him from the Cursed Earth in to Deep Space on Justice One. This issue also introduces Judge Lopez and future Chief Judge - Barbara Hershey.
Cover: Ian Gibson (Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter)
